statements.sql: select products.*, sum(reviews.rating) as totalRating from `products` inner join `categoryables` on `products`.`id` = `categoryables`.`categoryable_id` left join `reviews` on `products`.`id` = `reviews`.`product_id` where `categoryables`.`categoryable_type` = 'App\Model\Common\Product' and `reviews`.`status` = '1' and `categoryables`.`category_id` in ('6', '7', '8') group by `products`.`id` order by `totalRating` desc limit 7
